website_summaries.verdict: A wide range of sizes and reliable leak-resistant fabric make finding the perfect wrap for your specific dog simpler than ever.
pros: offers a wider range of sizes than most brands
Hook-and-loop panel attaches securely, so the wrap won't slip off during high activity periods
The inner fabric is soft and will not irritate your dog's skin
The wrap is highly absorbent and effectively prevents leaks
Easily removes stains and odour with just one wash
cons: Hook-and-loop panel is quite strong, making the wrap difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are the best dog diapers I have ever purchased and believe me, I have purchased many types. I have a male that lives to mark my house and these diapers protect my house and him. They are made well, the Velcro is strong and the diaper washes up nicely. I do not dry them though. And for once, the little stinker cannot wiggle out of them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Isolde M Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months use (3-5)
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our disabled Pyrenees. We took care of him 24/7 his last few months of life. These worked great but we used them with a pad called "Poise" for extra absorbing power. They helped us get through the last difficult months of our special dogs life. The wraps were getting warn by month 3. I bet we could have used them a couple more though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would never recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused my dog to develop a burn. My dog has been using belly bands for many years (he's very old and can't control himself), and this is by far the worst belly band we have ever used. It was a dollar or two cheaper than the PUPTECH bands we purchased on Amazon. The other bands keep the urine away from his skin and/or do not have the same caustic materials in the lining that this one does. Either way, I would never recommend this product to anyone, nor will I buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: My dog gets them off every time
customer_reviews.text: I sized my dog according to the instructions. I tried the normal size Velcro tightening and then I tried a slightly harsher cinching on my chihuahua. Either way, he becomes Houdini. I will go to his bed later in the night and the diapers are laying neatly placed on the side. Almost folded as if to say, nice try. As far as I'm concerned, it didn't work. On the other hand, I really have a smart al·eck chihuahua, which I guess l already knew. Go Parker go, just not on my rug, Please!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Q

customer_reviews.title: These are horrible. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 14 years and had diabetes and therefore, has a weak bladder. I bought 3 packs of 3 (9 wraps altogether) to save money on the Amazon disposable wraps. We used them for about a week and discovered what a big mistake that was. These leak and do not hold as much liquid as do the Amazon paper wraps. If you buy these, the best of luck to you. I cannot understand how this product got such a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: RabbiEli

customer_reviews.title: Cannot hate them more
customer_reviews.text: I hate the fasteners. They are so hard to separate! When i get home, my poor dog has to endure me trying to rip the velcro apart that takes such effort. I was much happier with another brand. Did I mention I hate them??
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Velcro is way too strong
customer_reviews.text: When we first received these I noticed the Velcro was very strong but as I used them and washed them the Velcro has become way too difficult to pull apart. I have use both hands and teeth to pull it apart. Not only that, but my dogs fur also gets pulled and yanked off from this Velcro. Wish I hadn't purchased two sets of them. As a note...I purchased another brand for my smaller dog and that Velcro and material have been much easier to use and kept a better shape than this brand
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Not pee-proof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my old dog. Im returning them because they leak. Directions say that the more you wash them the more water proof they become but just from the way they are "baggy" even though they are securely wrapped around the waist there is just too much room for the sanitary pad to float around. I used to have a snug fitting wrap that had no elastic which allowed the pad to stay exactly where its needed. Im going to return these and make my own.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed :( They fit well but the urine leaks through to the entire diaper. Each time I remove the wrap my little buddy's wet all the way around his body. Granted my floor isn't wet, but I don't want him to be wet either. I was really hoping this would be the answer to disposables, but I guess not. Also the gold wrap's velrco has already come loose on one corner.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fabregas

customer_reviews.title: Helps Stop Puddles!
customer_reviews.text: I have adjusted my former rating more positively because my little Morkie tolerates these belly wrap diapers better than he did, and they are a big help with his training. These also deter his marking. They are worth trying for frustrated owners of difficult to housetrain male dogs. I cannot say how well they will hold up in the long run, but the diapers have survived several washings. The dryer shrank one, but the setting was too high so remember to dry on low or line dry. They dry fairly fast on their own. I still wish my dog liked these better, but at least he's getting used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Trissel

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old, 13 pound, potty trained bichon mix started urinating on rug for some reason. Got a size M in these. Fit perfect. He got used to wearing quickly and seem not to bother him. He took off once, but haven't had that issue since. He did pee once, and no leaks. I have washed each diaper three times, air drying, and look new. No more worries about rugs getting peed on. He's been wearing during day, every day, except when he goes outside to potty. I take it off at night when he sleeps either in bed with me or in his kennel.
customer_reviews.author: Trahls

customer_reviews.title: Live these and my fur baby tolerates them
customer_reviews.text: I had to reorder in a larger size, my fault not the products. My baby is elderly and he sometimes has an error in judgment when we are visiting so these are the perfect answer. I can let him enjoy himself and if he has an accident, nothing is harmed. I cut panty liners to fit in them so I am confident they will not leak. They are really a fantastic product. Also, a special thank you to the seller for shipping with the post office, I prefer them as I know my package will be delivered to the right address and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Wild about Books

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather have the puddles
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst male diapers I have used. As soon as he pers in them, he needs a bath because the padding is not absorbent. Not only does he get wet around his private parts, but he also gets wet all the way around his belly where ever the band touches and is immediately smelly. I would definitely rather have the puddles on my tile then be required to be at him every time he has an accident. Also, the Velcro is not the quality of other diapers I have used on him, and doesn't stick nearly as well. They did fit my 8- pound Maltese Pomeranian well, and the colors are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I have a 6lb tiny Pomeranian Bought an xs and way to small couldn't even reach to close is Went back and bought a small, still way to small couldn't even close it still Finally went back a third time and bought a med, this time could close it but still snug. How is my 6lb tiny pom possibly fitting a large?? Lol Good thing they are nice quality because I would NOT have gone back 3 times to get the size right. They won me over in quality. All in all good but BUY 1 TO 2 SIZES UP!
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason I gave this 4 stars is because although they are simply perfect...they DO need pads in them. Without the pads, they DO leak. I have a dog sitting business, so when its pouring out, ALL the dogs must wear these in my home, so these DO need pads, or else you'll be doing a LOT of laundry. They DO wash & dry without shrinkage. If you get the correct size, they are a furniture LIFE SAVER.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie D.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks 15% of the time
customer_reviews.text: My puppy Italian greyhound needs to wear diapers at night. We used disposable ones for his first 6 months but they are expensive and not environmentally friendly. We gave these a shot but it was too good to be true. There needs to be a better leak guard. Urine spills out of the side and soaks the "water proof" outer fabric as well. They leak approx 1 out of 7 uses. Frustrating and exhausting waking up from the smell of pee and having to wash clean sheets yet again (also ruining our mattress) Back to disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of all the brands this is my fave!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - soft adjustable and has kept my little guy from marking territory- catches those lil puddles and no accidents that this diaper hasn't captured! Not stiff like several I have purchased!
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on...
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog who has started having incontinence issues/ accidents in his sleep. The product is made very quality, but I'm not sure if we are doing something wrong or not, but it keeps slipping off, which renders it entirely ineffective for the purpose. Also, it's great if it's just catching dribble, but the couple times he's had a bigger accident, the pee always seems to make it to the edges of the garment, where it's just one thin layer of cloth, so it doesn't catch everything on the pad itself and keep the urine contained.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D Neuberger

customer_reviews.title: Fits according to the size chart! (:
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the X-small for my chihuahua who measures at 12" around the waist. Fits perfectly! Keep in mind that if you buy the reusable pad inserts, it does create a tighter fit. EDIT: I've had these since August and the Velcro is still holding up perfectly! People that are complaining must not be washing them properly. I hand wash and air dry them once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Edit: my pups have been using these belly wraps since October of last year. The actual belly wrap is great but the Velcro is horrible. It is very weak and won't longer stick on 3 of the 6 belly wraps I purchased. I'm very disappointed. These are the best washable doggy straps I have purchased. I got mediums for my pomeranians that weigh 8 and 10 pounds. They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: They are soft, colorful, absorbent. I put a cheap thin bladder control pad inside so I can just dispose of those when needed, and dont have to wash the actual belly band but once or twice a week. I bought a size S for my toy poodle. He doesnt even seem to know he's wearing anything...no problem keeping them on. I also bought a different brand..Pet Megasin...which I prefer just a bit more than these. They are just a bit wider and longer. But both brands work well. They work sooo much better than the disposable belly bands. ..they stay on and just are all around better. ... plus they look cute on the dog.. love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I will update the review once I get a size that fits my 4 year old Rottweiler that has kidney disease. He is starting to leak and I wanted these because pads can be added. These are GINORMOUS! I could wrap them around one and a half times. I read other reviews that said they run small. Perhaps there is a discrepancy at the ends of the size spectrum. I've started a return and I'm going to order the L and XL to see if one of those will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best part is how sturdy and leakproof they are.
customer_reviews.text: These are super, super sturdy, easy to clean (I soak them in a soap/OxyClean solution for a couple days after rinsing in the sink,) and they're leak-proof. They dry quickly. The large velcro pad is very strong and never comes off on its own. I always carry these with me whenever I go over a friend's house so that my unneutered male dog won't mark on their furniture. I also use them after potty training, because I sleep sometimes 10 hours, and it keeps him from having to hold his pee for all that time if he needs to go. He doesn't seem to mind wearing them. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mfskarphedin

customer_reviews.title: These enable me to keep my dog longer
customer_reviews.text: My aussie is old and no longer can hold his urine .. If I had not found these diapers I would have had to put him to sleep. I have been using them for over a year.. I now have to change them on him sometimes 3 times a day so I purchased two more sets. He will come in from out side and stand and wait for me to put them on him.. at night we have to use a disposal under the washable but it works like a charm.. I HIGHLY recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after making modifications
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large since my 2 newly adopted Bichons are wide in the middle. The circumference fit perfect. The problem was their bodies are short and stocky. These diapers covered their bodies from front legs to back legs. I decided to cut 2 inches from the center of the diapers, remove the padding then reassemble the two outer pieces that included the elastic and Velcro. I then added an adult incontinence pad to each. Now I don't have to wash the diaper so often, just replace the pads. SUGGESTIONS: (1)Make the diapers in two widths, short and regular. (2)Make the diapers with and without sewn-in absorbent pads.
customer_reviews.author: MLV

customer_reviews.title: These are WONDERFUL !
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love them already...... my long haired Chihuahua is 8.6 lbs, and has a 13" waist over his man parts;) We went with the size Small (as suggested by other happy customers), and I must say I'm happy we did. They fit perfect -not too tight or loose and he can't get it off. This, no doubt, will fix his habit of peeing in our basement. A+ .. Will be back for more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabb18Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, tolerated by confused dogs
customer_reviews.text: Used these for an aging dog and for a younger dog with encephalitis - both tolerated them well and they are quite absorbent. They stay in place without irritating or aggravating the dogs. Pull them a tad snug before securing the velcro and see that the dog's hind legs aren't rubbing against them unnecessarily. Check for wetness with a finger or two slipped in as you would with a child's diaper or pull=up and when it's wet remove it, wipe the dog clean and let him air dry then put on a dry one. These wraps have room for a liner if your dog needs one for additional absorption - my dogs didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Suzannah

customer_reviews.title: Talk to your vet first
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful and talk to your vet first. These were ‘working’ for us for a while until my baby got a UTI from using them. He most likely has some underlying issues that we are ruling out as we are not sure what was causing the frequent urinating yet, but the UTI came secondary to using the diapers. I feel like a dodo that I didn’t realize that siting in a urine soaked diaper for hours wasn’t going to have negative effects. Best of luck to all the fur babies with polyuria!
customer_reviews.author: Jackeroo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I have a 12 year old lab mix who has recently started leaking at night. He is 80+ pounds and shaped like a barrel. The disposables barely fit around his middle and were too narrow to cover his manhood. These fit great in XXL size. The XL fit, but are a little tight. He has no problem wearing them. Sometimes we can't get it off fast enough in the morning and he'll fill it up as soon as we walk outside. It can hold A LOT!
customer_reviews.author: michelle taylor

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted less than 24 hrs
customer_reviews.text: I received these male dog diapers yesterday and in less than 24hrs and only used twice the velcro is already falling apart. I bought these in conjunction with the washable pads for my 4 months old boston terrier to use it when he rides in my car. They fit great but the quality is questionable. Very dissapointed!!!! Update: the company contacted me and sent me a new set. I'm increasing my review from 1 star to 3 stars because of great customer service. I'll see how this new set hold up.
customer_reviews.author: AngelNYDR

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, but recent sizsing problem
customer_reviews.text: My grown daughter and I have both purchased the Wegreeco male wraps in times past. However, my recent order for the size medium arrived, and seemed larger than the previous ones used. They also have Velcro strips, not the patch used previously (I learned the smaller sizes have not changed in use of the patch). Anyway, in the midst of Amazon shutting down phones due to the recent coronavirus pandemic, I was able to communicate back and forth with Wegreeco. Unfailingly, they have offered superior service, going above and beyond to make things right, providing a replacement. I will continue to purchase from them because of these qualities.
customer_reviews.author: mew

customer_reviews.title: Too big, Wide- dog gets out of it
customer_reviews.text: Size large is the correct circumference size to get around my 17lb dog’s belly but it is way too wide, too much fabric, and my dog just slides out of it. In addition, it is way too wide for the pad that I put inside so if he should P I can just remove it instead of having to wash the diaper.Unfortunately I didn’t try it until it was too late to return them. The size small for my 12 pound dog works great. In addition, it is way too wide for the pad that I put inside so if he should Peepee I can just remove & dispose of it instead of having to wash the diaper.
customer_reviews.author: E. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Stays on great, does not absorb as well as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought these for my male pup who is older now and can't hold his pee as much. They are easy to put on, and once on they stay one! They do not leak, but they do not absorb as well either which is why the product is only rated four stars. At times the entire diaper gets soaked and I have to give my dog a bath because it gets in his fur. Other than that the positives out way the negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Parfanity

customer_reviews.title: Saved my carpets!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great invention! My dog is potty trained for the most part but whenever he is at home alone he has anxiety and he urinates. I started putting up puppy pads until somebody told me about this product. I left it on him and even put a thunder coat on him when I went to work. When I came back the thunder coat did not have a single drop of your in on it. And the belly band was saturated in urine but not a single drop was leaking out. These are very easy to clean as well! I highly recommend this product over any other type of puppy pad or similar products to potty training!
customer_reviews.author: Roshani Dhital

customer_reviews.title: Washes well, doesn’t leak so far
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. The dogs don’t mind them terribly after about 4 days. They are holding up to washing, and help prevent accidents. As with all dogs a schedule is important, so every hour or so we got out to do business. They will pull them off, dog dependent, one of ours more than the other. But they are helping unless I miss ‘snake hips’ slithering out of his and doing something if I’m not paying attention. 2 dogs so we bought 4 to rotate through the wash what with their just being neutered and they are young. If they have an accident in them, no leaks noticed as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Tulsa

customer_reviews.title: 🐕🐕 Great alternative to cleaning up dog pee from around the house! 🐕🐕
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year old male Yorkie Poo can't seem to hold his pee anymore. He is 12 pounds and we first ordered the XS, but they were too snug. The size S are what you need for a dog more than 10 pounds. These work well and are absorbant. There have been no leakage issues. Most of all I appreciate no longer having to clean random pee spots from around the house. These worked well so we ordered a second set of three so there is always a clean one available between laundry days. I recommend having at least six of these doggie pee diapers if you plan on having them on your dog 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality Doggie Diapers for CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO much nicer than I expected them to be, what a nice surprise! Right out of the package I noticed the quality is really high. The stitching is perfect. The velcro is also sewn in perfectly and allows a wide range of fit within each size range. True to advertised size. It's extra absorbent without being too bulky. I can't say enough about the price point. I would have paid $10 for one of these yet I got THREE for that price! 😀 My dog is a little depressed to be wearing it, but that's what he gets for starting a bad habit of sneaking around and peeing on my carpet! I would buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Greatly made, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 12 year old beagle, who has incontinence. We line them with Depends (no, seriously...do it), and it saves us a grip of money and time. This method is a fraction of the cost of buying actual disposable dog diapers, no matter the reason you're using them. These fit well, though I would say they're a bit on the wide side for a smedium sized dog (25ish lbs). The best part? They don't fall apart after being washed. Pro tip: reverse-attach the Velcro before washing, and they won't stick to anything else, AND they'll adhere better/longer since lint can't get trapped.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for senior dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We recently rescued a senior dog, due to dementia he was having random urine accidents all over the house. Otherwise he is the sweetest, most adorable little guy, but I couldn't have him ruining my hard wood floors. These belly bands have solved the issue! The are easy to put on, they seem comfortable and extremely absorbent, and rinse out easily. They are very well made too, a really good value. I then throw them in the wash and they are good as new. I've purchased two more packages since my initial purchase. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Fit is consistent, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different brands and this brand is far and away the most consistently sized and more comfortable on my heathens. My dogs are sneakers and “markers” so when I am at work, they are now in their big boy pants, which have improved my quality of life when I get home. I no longer have to figure out what they “might” and often do, do, and have to clean up. They wash well in the washer and I dry them on low low... no issues with shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frank, FNP

customer_reviews.title: Well made, attractive, works
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made. Nice colors. Good pad, nice elastic to keep snug down under. Strong velcro 4x4 grips g9ve lots of fitting options. Good fit on my 15 lb lasa mix fully overlapped. My 11 lb JRT needs it snugged another inch. Could fit a larger dog,too. Remember to take the length of his...ummm. this medium is 7". all my dogs are neutered so i can't speak to that fit. Out of 3 males none have tried to remove it. Washes well for me in machine. no dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Had to buy another set =)
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, Thick, absorbent, extremely comfortable for my dog, elastic side allows for great movement, but no leaks. I have a naughty Male Boston Terrier who comes to visit my house and this prevents him from marking. He ran out the door before I could remove the band one day and he full on peed in it, no leaks at all! Great Product, I am buying my second set today. Great, Great, Great, highly recommend! I wash them in the washing machine and hang to dry, with amazing results. I bought Size Medium for a 20.5 Lb Boston Terrier. He may be able to wear a small, but i had such great luck, i decided to order medium again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prevents marking
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to measure first. We had to exchange our first pack due to ordering too small. My miniature Pomeranian has marking issues. We were growing pretty frustrated on how to prevent the damage he was doing to our carpets. Finally we decided to try these. It saved our carpets and sanity. They stay in place all day, hold well, and do not bother him at all! I wash them by themselves in the washing machine with a normal amount of detergent and scent beads and do not notice any lingering urine smell in them. We have repurchased multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie Lane

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be comfortable for my dog, as he never tries to pull them off or chew on them. The velcro is strong. They have already been washed MANY times (our dog is old) and are holding up nicely. The smell of dog pee simply can't be completely removed after multiple accidents, so I do think we'll replace them eventually, but that's not the fault of the product. They are quite absorbent and for the most part leak-proof, but if it's a really large pee and then the dog lays down on it, it can exhibit some moisture. Still more effective than disposable dog diapers, and way more eco-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kallshian

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many different male dog wraps, both disposable and reusable. I hate the waste of disposable, but all the reusable were awful! The ones before would have the velcro tear off right away or rub the dog and leave red spots. These were perfect! I love, love, love them! Our dog is house-trained, but randomly marks. these are comfy enough for him to wear the whole time he is inside and fit great! So far, the velcro (which is very strong) has stayed with the wrap. I make sure to hold it when I pull.I could not be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: No more drips!
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for about a week. Working pretty well so far. My dog feels awkward with them and walks a little funny when first put on, but gets used to it fairly quickly. Does not try to remove and sleeps throughout the night with them on. My dog tends to drip--he's not fully incontinent. The absorbency seems adequate, but once there was some dampness on the outside of the wrap. If your dog has full accidents, you may need to add additional padding. Have not washed yet, so can't speak to that. Overall, I'm pleased with the item. I do wish they came in other colors/patterns than what is available.
customer_reviews.author: Angelle

customer_reviews.title: Great products - no more surprise puddles!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great products. I have an elderly dog who has decided to make the house his personal toilet. The belly bands have made our house a much nicer place! He has figured out how to roll around and get the band off, but he seems to be getting used to them now. They are very absorbent, and I haven’t noticed any leaking. I rinse them and then soak them in hot soapy water before washing in a lingerie bag in the machine. They are holding up fine so far. Sizing is spot-on with the chart provided.
customer_reviews.author: J. Givens

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brand but the ones with the 2 strips of Velcro. Not these.
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave these a higher rating but now after washing them multiple times the "velcro" doesn't stick as well. I'm referring to these that have one wide strip not the ones that have 2 smaller strips. The smaller strips seem to be the real Velcro or very similar. These are not. I've tried combing out anything that may effect the stickiness but I can't seem to get them to stick like they originally did. Buy the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Gawthrope

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate purchasing these. Yes, they seem a little odd and to say the least I was not too keen on them at first when they were recommended by our Vet. We have special needs dogs we rescued and these made a huge difference when we brought them home to potty train. They are absorbent, leak-proof, fit well, and are easy to wash. Now they no longer need them but for puppies, senior dogs, or dogs with medical issues these can be so helpful. Great brand---would purchase this brand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Family Adventure Shop

customer_reviews.title: Saved us!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these babies! Was ready to strangle my sweet little Pug Dexter, he marked EVERYTHING!! Haven’t had a male dog in years so I forgot about this charming little trait in they have. They saved my furniture, carpet, drapes, PURSE😡, AND sweet little Dexter. They wash beautifully and there is no smell after I wash either in washing machine or by hand!! Love them. Have purchased 3 sets so far.....
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Best Diapers for the Price, Bar None
customer_reviews.text: For less than the price of two diapers at the local farm and home store, I got five of these diapers from Amazon. I got the three pack, then loved them so much I ordered a pair of the jeans looking ones. And they are adorable. I have not seen them leak, and they really soak up the liquid. The only complaint, if I were forced to find one, is that the Velcro is the strongest Velcro I have ever tried to pull apart. Granted, after several uses it loosens up a bit, but wow. Get these. There is no comparison anywhere. They work as advertised, look great, and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant. I have a male dachshund puppy. They are known for being hard to potty train and we'd struggled even with a schedule. Well we bought these and they were a game changer. If he did pee they fully absorbed everything so I didn't have to worry about an accident on the furniture. He also didn't like wetting them so it helped to slowly teach him to hold his bladder longer. Once he was consitent we were able to stop using them. These were instrumental in potty training. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Owen

customer_reviews.title: Pads keep the floor clean, but dog is wet...all around wherever diaper touches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 16yr old toy poodle. He is taking water pills for congestive heart failure. These kept furniture and carpet dry. But, when I removed diaper, he was wet on his back and everywhere diaper touched him. The disposable diapers do not do that...loved the softness of diapers but will not buy more. I'll use in an emergency situation only....I'm using Vet's Best and Value Wraps. Both are great, no smell and Toby stays completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. King

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent! Perfect for our incontinent dog.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These diapers really work. We have a 13-year old dog who is becoming more and more incontinent. We ordered these diapers and they have been a lifesaver! Our dog is 60lbs and I ordered size XL. He has peed in it a few times and it catches EVERYTHING - which is a lot of pee to hold since he is 60 lbs. No leakage and they are easy to wash. Three seems like the magic number so you can always have a clean one in rotation. I also appreciate being able to order them in Black so that it blends in with his fur.
customer_reviews.author: MandaWahoo

customer_reviews.title: These are great, too
customer_reviews.text: Identical to another brand so giving same great review. These work great for normal amounts of urine. I use a liner folded in half for overnights and no leaks. I have an HE washer so I put Lysol Laundry Sanitizer in the fabric softener dispenser to dispense at rinse stage, and add an extra rinse cycle. They smell great when they come out. I recommend washing a small load daily. I bought enough for 4 days worth (24 wraps) and am just rotating them. The 10 pack of liners I got separately will last a long time and I just wash them at the same time. Happy with these money saving alternatives to disposable wraps.
customer_reviews.author: sheltongenie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think that these would work, but I bought them hoping they would help keep me from having to wash loads of laundry everyday. My Rudy is paralyzed in his back end and dribbles constantly. He is about 40-45 lbs and his waist is 21 inches. I bought the large size, w/out pockets. I was washing towels several times a day to keep him and his bed clean. I tried these the day I got them thinking they would leak, but they don't! He wore one all night last night and the diaper didn't move or leak! I wish I would have bought these a while ago!
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Wish we'd discovered these long ago.
customer_reviews.text: We use these on our little Yorkie that got into the bad habit of getting up in the middle of the night to pee, when he really didn't need to. He wet in a diaper once, and it absorbed it all without causing him discomfort. We still use them most nights, taking it off after we get up with him once to let him out. There's been no more puddles in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Great as Wraps
customer_reviews.text: We used these mainly as wraps for our 155 lb male Great Dane when he had cancer and was on steroids. He drank tons of water and so we simply put 2 large people pads inside the wraps and put them on him. It seemed he never minded wearing them and we felt confident that his bed and the floor was protected. I would NOT use them without something inside, I do not feel they are absorbent at all without an inside layer. But this is ok because I had planned on these being like this to use. I like how comfortable they fit and they look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these! Will burn your dog!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend these at all. I've been trying to find ways to deal with both my boys wanting to mark thier territories and instead of helping them I've hurt them. Whatever these are made of is burning my dogs and they both have sores. I'm not using them anymore and I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alastrine Luna

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality But Too Small - Easy Return Process!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I am unable to rate absorbency, how leak proof or effective these wraps are since they did not fit our canine, I could observe that the wraps look and feel very durable and have a great design so I am giving five stars. However, the XL was way too small for our Male Rottweiler. We could barely get the velcro surfaces to touch on the edges of the wrap we tried on him. So, we are returning and re-ordering the wraps in XXL with hopes the largest size will fit our boy. The return process is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and good price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior male poodle that pees on everything. I wish I had known about these years ago. Best thing I have ever bought. He didn’t like at first. Actually, it took about a week of watching him be miserable wearing it. Now, he stands perfectly still to let me remove before going outside and when he comes in he stands by the door for me to put back on. Great quality. I wash by hand and hang dry. I would recommend to anyone for their puppy training or any dog that urinates in house. No more mess to clean, no more smell of pee. Simply fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Runs big! Takes time to dry after wash
customer_reviews.text: So we order these for a camping trip for our foster dog. He pees really randomly even though we've tried potty training. He's an 8lb Chihuahua puppy. The size small diapers were $5 cheaper than extra small, for the same amount, so I thought, "oh he'll fit!" No. I was wrong. It felt super tight to us, and it kept sliding off his hips. When we pulled the diaper so the velcro basically wasnt touching, it was so much better!! It stayed on!! He only peed in it once and without a drop on the floor!! Washed easily with dishsoap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: We have an older dog that was potty trained, but that began to urinate occasionally in the house. We are giving him a medication for canine dementia, and are also repeating the potty trained normally given to a puppy. Because we are not sure what is causing the occasional urination problem, we are putting these diapers on him while in the house between trips to the back yard or on walks. He does not seem to mind the diapers, they stay in place, and they are easy to launder. We have ordered 3 sets, so we always have clean ones available and can wash several at a time. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hoppe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of wraps I've bought off Amazon, and these are significantly better than the first kind. They are made very well, and the fit is so much more comfortable for our pup. The scrunched part makes a huge difference in how these wraps fit. When I need to repurchase I will be going with this brand!! It is also really cool that they came with a few extra velcro patches, because like anything it will start to wear over time. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Diane

customer_reviews.title: These have been a great help to our 'old man'
customer_reviews.text: Our 'old man' is going on 11 and has started having some occasional incontinence on the furniture and around the house and to keep our sanity we began doing some research and found a few recommendations for these wraps. So far these have worked out excellent for us. I have purchased an additional set so we always have plenty on hand. I believe the elastic and velcro materials will last and overall these are very well made. Obviously these absorb quite a bit of liquid however they do have their limitations but they definitely have helped and made things much easier around the house for our 'old man'.
customer_reviews.author: ray4jc

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog finds this very uncomfortable. At night he can’t sleep because he’s bothered and tries to remove it himself. I thought I would save some money instead of using disposables. But each band is a one-time use before you need to wash them, I tried to hand wash but very difficult to get the smell out. My senior dog takes diuretics so he pees a lot. A set of 3 bands is not enough. I would be washing all the time even if I had a dozen. It might work for others but not my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Washable Male Dog Diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Inexpensive and they work. They fit my dog perfectly and no leaking. I love the big velcro and it is very secure. There is enough velcro for adjustment if needed. They are soft and my dog seems to have no problem wearing them. He just needs them through the night of bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Macchiaverna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fit, and absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These pads fit great for all of my shelter dogs that feel like they have the conquer the world with their marking... ugh... These fit nice, are great quality, and don't leak... my only issue is ugh they stink.... well as expected since it is pee in there but ewww. they do freshen up after washing and drying them but ugh.. I may take the suggestion to place a maxipad inside. I think that may help. I have a small terrier, a shih Tzu, a shih Tzu poo, and a poodle mix. Have tried all sizes and they fit well and stay on... great product.
customer_reviews.author: indecisivepc

customer_reviews.title: Good temporary solution
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my aging chihuahua guy. I add a half of a pad to the belly band and no leaks. I have had these only a few weeks and have been hand washing them. The thing I am noticing is this bands have stretched. When I first received them, they barely fit (xs) around his waist. Now they are almost too big. 😢. I will be shopping for a different brand very soon. I don’t understand why they would make them to stretch out of shape. They are literally several inches longer now than they were a few weeks ago when I started using them.
customer_reviews.author: Resa

customer_reviews.title: 80 lb dog, no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful, elderly, 80 pound, Chesapeake Bay retriever, CurlyJoe, is so relieved to have these magical pants. He understood what they were for, immediately. He goes through 3 a day (I ordered 6), and they have stood up well to daily washing. Since he has a hard time standing or walking even short distances, he is so much less humiliated by not making it outside. As I mentioned, he weighs 80+ pounds, and that's means there's a heavy load of urine in his pants, and there have been absolutely no leaks. One thing I would suggest, is using adult bath wipes, to cleanse your dog's belly between changes. Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollylane

customer_reviews.title: After several months' worth of experience...
customer_reviews.text: These were too good to be true initially. Over time, the corners of the big Velcro rectangle on the underside of the label end of the diaper became like little daggers. As I go to pull the diaper ends together over my Pom's back, the corner pieces poke his right side (he's facing me) and he lets out a yelp. And runs away! My solution was to sew a doubled-up piece of flannel over the bottom third-ish of that Velcro, to completely cover the pokey Velcro corners. I had 12 diapers. That was a fair bit of work. Unusable over time as those corners got hard and jabby if I hadn't fixed them.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Rancher

customer_reviews.title: Not leakproof
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product at first. The fit is good and the material seems quality. However if my dog happens to pee in these a few times instead of just once, the outer layer of the material becomes wet. Thus my carpet, couch and such get urine on them. The cheap disposable ones I also use do not leak through the outer layer. It seems that these do not have a waterproof inner liner. Disappointing really. If the company would fix this issue, I would purchase again. However with how they are made now, I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lss101

customer_reviews.title: It works for one of my chihuahuas, but not the other...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 elderly male chihuahuas who can't hold their water, so having a good supply of these is imperative! This product works great on one of my chihuahuas, but the other chihuahua likes to mess with it until it is either upside down or off completely! I have no idea how to combat that; I have some belly bands that I created myself just for him that seem to work better, as they are made from cotton instead, therefore a little more friction that might help? Not sure. Just guessing on that one. I don't have time to keep sewing belly bands however, so was hoping that these would work for both.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Morales

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these weiner wraps to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I didn't purchase these with unrealistic expectations but I am extremely happy with them. I have an older boxer that has behavioral issues and he will pee in the house when he feels like it. These diapers have been a lifesaver. Since he's not peeing everywhere we can actually let him roam the house when we're not home now. They do have a great absorbency especially for him being a larger dog. I'll wash them on my sterile a cycle in my washer and it will get the smell out. I just hate having to touch them when I take them off of him but to save my hardwood floors it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a worthwhile purchase! We purchased 3 sets for our 14-year old Yorkie who due to age has a hard time holding his pee. So easy to put on and take off and most times they stay dry, but when he has an accident they are extremely absorbent. We soak them in white vinegar and water before we wash them to eliminate the odor. They wash and dry perfectly. We had tried the disposable initially but they are a waste of money and landfill space. I am sure that they would be good for potty training also. Kudos for such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Saved our sanity
customer_reviews.text: We have a little dog who pees out of spite or some innate need to drive us nuts. We remodeled our house with new carpet and it was him or my husband. Luckily I found a compromise with these diapers. We have a pomeranian/poodle mix who can be very fluffy. He's only about 8.5 lbs. I have both the XS and S. The S is really the better fitting one, though the XS can do the trick. I think the XS would only work for like a chihuahua or yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper but...
customer_reviews.text: We have several sets of these and they work fairly well. They hold plenty of volume if you need that. They fit fairly well. I do need to layer them with a dragbag or my dog can wiggle right out. My biggest complaint is the velcro. It is massive and strong, so strong that it ruins laundry. I have to wash these velcroed together or the other diapers get ruined. I actually started removing the velcro and replacing with snaps ( like the wegreeo cloth diapers) and it works so much better for us. When we used the velcro, it also needed to be cleaned out often or it really lost its stickiness.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: The best cloth dog diapers!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic diapers for two of my dogs- one is a rescue who was nuetered at 3 years old, one is an old man. These diapers are cozy and stay on them well. They was nicely, too. At this point, we own about 25 of these diapers so that we always have them ready to go. ***WASHING TIP*** Wash cold, then wash hot with a double rinse. Use 1 cup of white vinegar in the wash to aid in rinsing of the urine from the fabric. Hang in the sun to dry. Sun also bleaches out urine stains.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hallman

customer_reviews.title: Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like, since I do rescue work, I’m always training someone! I’ve tried various brands of diapers including other washable ones. The quality of these is best by far! Nice and thick plus wide enough that they don’t leak. They also have a washable pad inside which saves money on liners. I have bought these several times and I keep going back to this brand. They last through numerous washing and fit comfortably on my dogs. Recommend for anyone who is looking for something that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Tibetan Spaniel boys who just have to mark everything in my house. It was bad. So I ordered one set of Wegreeco male wraps. I was so happy with them I now have 27 wraps. I swap them out a few times a day, and wash every 3 days. They are sturdy, the material holds moisture well. The velcro is more than sufficient, they don't just come off. If you have a dog that marks and are looking for a good solution, Wegreeco Wraps are well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best ones out there
customer_reviews.text: These have been a lifesaver! I have a senior dog that constantly has a slow leak so these work perfect for him. He is also a very large dog. Nearly a hundred pounds and very thick. I have purchased other items similar to this that did not fit him. This is the only brand that is actually large enough. Definitely recommend. The velcro stays really well. He can wiggle out of them if he wants to, but for the most part it doesn't seem to bother him
customer_reviews.author: mmd

customer_reviews.title: Dog lover
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are wonderful! Our 6 year old male Irish Setter developed incontinence so we needed something that would be comfortable while keeping the home clean. These diapers fit perfectly if you measure your dog as the vendor describes. They are extremely durable. Our first purchase has been in use since March 2017 and they are still wearing and fitting like new! We've added more to our stock so we only have to wash every 3rd day or so. I'd recommend these to anyone whose dog needs protection in the home.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Stops Territory Marking
customer_reviews.text: My dogs pee everywhere. I hate it. This helps. Buy a size up so that they can’t wiggle their junk out of it. Velcro is very strong. I have two male chihuahuas and neither could take this thing off. It’s also absorbent as one dog still pees only now it ends up in the belly band. Washes great! I wish the band was s little wider, possibly with elastic to fit snug around the dogs private’s. But overall it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Maria-Jo

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These belly bands have never leaked and are super absorbent. My 14 year old Schipperke isn't always able to hold his bladder and sometimes has emptied entirely in his belly band. My dog doesn't have a tail and with the double Velcro, it allows me to adjust the belly band to be tighter at the back so it doesn't slip off but more loose in the front if needed. When the band is saturated, I spray the inside with an odor removing spray, such as Nature's Miracle, before machine washing with laundry detergent. Occasionally, I've had to wash them twice to remove odors fully. Because they are so absorbent, they can sometimes hold onto the smell after 1 wash.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I run a dog boarding facility from my home, and I have these in almost all sizes. Whenever we get a new male boarder, all my boys think they need to show them who is boss, all over the house.... Using these helps teach them that they don't need to show who's boss (surprise, it's me! :p) and that they can live together briefly. It saves me a huge amount of time and trouble cleaning up after them. All I do is close them, throw them in the wash, and they are good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha B

customer_reviews.title: Just got these...
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today, so I cannot speak to their absorbency, or how leak proof they are. But they are pretty dang good quality—the bag was fairly heavy. I haven’t had to wash one yet either. I got these because my senior dog (almost 14) is now on steroids, and of course that’s making him need more bathroom breaks but I have to work all day—so we’ll see how well these work to about some indoor accidents. Oh he’s a 30-35 LB cockapoo and thankfully I ordered the large...probably could have ordered the XL and it would have been fine too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Runs small! Definitely measure!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy, washes well, very absorbent, Velcro is super strong. But make sure you measure! I have a 14 lb shin Tzu mix. He is a small dog, a lap dog, his legs are tiny.. But he still wears a medium, and the Velcro only closes half way. I actually tried the large on him, and there the Velcro fully attached but the wrap pretty much covered his whole body! Sho he wears the medium. I think the manufacturer should make them a bit longer....in the meantime, go buy what the measure is, not what you think the size of your dog is!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I have two male dogs. One was recently adopted and he is a senior. They began to mark in my home for ranking. These belly bands put a stop to that, and I finally have my sanity back! The bands have also helped me see how urine seems to "drip" from both of them occasionally, despite not having a UTI. So to protect my furniture and carpet, I will continue to use these indefinitely! Great product, excellent quality. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBee

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We have an elderly Yorkie who recently started peeing in the house instead of going outside. These belly wrap diapers are working very well. He is a 12 pound dog, the large size go from right behind his front legs to right in front of his hind legs. The velcro tabs are long enough to allow a large amount of adjustment, and work perfectly! Since he's been wearing them, it has eliminated the soaked rugs. He hasn't minded wearing them at all, walks around just fine. I bought a 3 pack, need to purchase more so I can rotate them as they need to be washed. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Saving my furniture
customer_reviews.text: I've used male dog wraps for years and I've paid high prices. I was thrilled to find these. They are very attractive - my weenie dog looks cute in his sporty wraps. I like the expanded coverage underneath and the narrow top - and. the velcro is just the right size and strength to. hold. The inside absorption is good, but honestly, I have always tucked in a disposable premie diaper and use the cloth wraps like a diaper holder. I find it keeps my doggie's privates dryer so no irritation of the weenie's weenie. And the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: V. Scott

customer_reviews.title: No more wed bedding
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has pretty major anxiety, and won't crate safely in our absence. Mostly that is ok, unless there is rain or a storm. His go to is to pee on our bed. But NO more!!! If there is even a slight prediction of rain in the forecast when we're away, we diaper our dog. He can not remove them, and so far it has absorbed anything he has peed. This is a huge quality of life change for us. :) No more sheet and bedding washing with every rain. Yay. Seems to wash fine, and I dry on low with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: famof5andcritters

customer_reviews.title: Great doggy diaper
customer_reviews.text: Our older dog started having health issues, the medication he took made him have trouble holding his pee all day while we were at work, these diapers were a life saver. Easy to take on and off, easy to wash. For the most part are leak proof, I guess it just depends on how much your dog pees in it but a reasonable amount and it won't leak. This product has been so helpful to us!
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better male wraps
customer_reviews.text: My old man Spanky is now able to go everywhere in the house, thanks to his new potty reps, when I first seen the wraps I thought those have to be terribly uncomfortable to a dog but once I got them and put them on him they were perfect couldn’t be anything better they are soft and no matter how much he peas they sure don’t like or get full and he peas a lot, I am so glad that I got these he is now able to go everywhere in the house and he absolutely loves it, thank you so much for these potty wraps they were perfect for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Debora Collins

customer_reviews.title: Use with Poise pads
customer_reviews.text: And they work perfectly. If the dog pees in the empty band, it spills out everywhere. Stick a full size Poise pad in it, and it hols a ton of liquid. But it does get heavy. I measured my dogs as directed, and the bands fit perfectly. The velcro holds well, however the dogs have learned how to hump under chairs and tables, and scrape the band off. Having 3 bands enables me to always have a spare when one gets soiled, or lost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! :)
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull/lab was recently hit by a car and had to go through a painful week at the vet (but they were great thankfully) so when he got home he was entirely incontinente with bloody urine which was normal but we have carpet and we were steam cleaning at least once a day, regular diapers hurt and were to small for this big boy. That’s where this diaper came in and saved the day!! Very impressive how much it holds, saves my carpet and my back. Thank you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: We have one dog that just doesn't get he cant pee on the rug, so we started using these. They do a good job of holding the pee but boy do they stink after awhile. We had to buy a few sets, we change him regularly, clean them repeatedly, even baby wipe all day, and he smells like pee all the time and have to give him baths all the time. Sometimes they slip while hes sleeping and hell pee on whatever hes laying on. So they work but you have to decided if you want to be doing this stuff every day all day for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: LittleOleLadies

customer_reviews.title: Now you can relax!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20lb mal and a 14lb frenchie. I ordered Medium for both and they are a perfect fit for both. The velcro is tough and gives lots of room to make smaller or bigger. Also came with extra Velcro to add on or replace. Absorbs well and does not leak through as they are water proof. The padding inside is thick and absorbs a lot. Gives lots of security and less headaches since you can relax without worry of finding pee spots. I used vinegar on pee spots before washing to help with urine smell.
customer_reviews.author: liza raya

customer_reviews.title: The product works but size can be an issue.
customer_reviews.text: I’d rather give 2.5 stars but that wasn’t an option. I’m giving such low stars because I feel the quality is not too notch. Two of the three do not fit my dog. I measured according to the chart. One fits him perfectly and so far so it’s worked and there has been no leakage. Two do not fit at all and are way to tight. They dig into him even with me velcroing as close to the edge as possible. I am disappointed in the size discrepancy. I would suggest ordering a bit larger than what you would expect. They are all labeled the same size but two are very clearly smaller than one.
customer_reviews.author: Addrienne

customer_reviews.title: Wash Great!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and with the added reusable pads I made they are absorbent enough. I would not use any bellyband or panty without an extra pad of some kind. I have purchased this brand before for a female and with the pad they work fine. These are well made and wash very well. I turn them inside out and close with velcro. I wash them in cold water with a small amount of detergent and a larger amount of white vinegar. They are then tossed into the dryer and tumble on the delicate cycle. They always come out great.
customer_reviews.author: MayaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love these but may cause infection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our huge doberman that likes to pee on everything! I changed it on him with a clean one 3 times a day and it held a lot of pee. He loved getting it put on and would wag his tail. Unfortunately I had to stop using because he got a sore on his private area. I might try again because they really helped. I'm treating him with bag balm for dogs. Not sure what caused it because I changed it a lot. I washed in the machine and hung dry.
customer_reviews.author: angel musk

product_meta.title: wegreeco Washable Male Dog Diapers (Pack of 3) - Washable Male Dog Belly Wrap
feature_bullets: DOG DIAPERS SMALL - Great for small dogs and puppies, waist size 11" to 14". Please measure your dog's waist right in front of the back legs to make a good fit.
NO WORRY LEAKAGE - The quickly absorbent pad is sewn into the diaper and has a leak-free outer layer to keep rugs, carpets, upholstered chairs and sofas dry. Leakage free.

SOFT & COMFORTABLE DIAPERS - We only choose comfortable materials for our dog wraps.The soft jersey inner wicks moisture away and keeps your dog drier during prolonged use. No "crinkly" or uncomfortable texture that causes many dogs to dislike the ordinary disposable diapers.

IMPROVING LANDFILL WASTE - By switching to washable dog diapers, wiithin 2 months they will pay for themselves and you will no longer need to purchase disposable diapers which will end up in a landfill after a single use.

GUARDIAN ANGEL OF YOUR DOG - The diapers are useful for untrained puppies, males spot marking, and stop your dog suffering from excitement urination or incontinence.They are precious gifts to accompany your pals when growing up and help improve mutual relations, enhancing the pleasure of its loyal throughout life.
